version_description:
- Updated information popups to improve the playing experience.
- Fixed small bugs.

- Updated information popups to improve the playing experience.
- Fixed lose blueprints bug.
- Fixed minor bugs.

- Fixed data loss issue
- Increased blueprints drop rate for higher rooms
- Added 300 new upgrades, added progression balance

- Added more battle waves.
- Fixed minor bugs.

- Added 800 New Gas Items
- Added 150 New Survivor Items
- Fixed Facebook connexion issues
- Reduced Cost of Kitchen and Pantry Upgrades
- Improved UI of Inventory Screen

- Fixed some performance issues in battle
- Fixed issues when reaching high levels of gas and survivors
- Fixed passive ability bonus
- Fixed lost chest after moving on

- Fixed update issue
- Fixed some performance issues in battle
- Fixed issues when reaching high levels of gas and survivors
- Fixed passive ability bonus
- Fixed lost chest after moving on

- Fixed room production bonus issue for high-level players
- New limited time special deal store
- New time bonus in lucky wheel
- New quick buy buttons for survivor items
- New quick buy buttons for gas items

- New weekly seasons game mode
- New PVP leaderboards with weekly rewards
- Added 500 extra waves
- Fixed issues
